task: Design an advanced marine ecosystem management system to monitor and enhance aquatic biodiversity, sustainably manage fishing activities, predict environmental impacts, assess species population dynamics, prevent illegal fishing, and integrate socio-economic benefits for local communities.

agents.name: client_agent
agents.role: Centralized coordinator that connects the user with all other agents, ensuring smooth functioning of the marine ecosystem management system.

agents.name: biodiversity_monitoring_agent
agents.role: Monitors marine biodiversity to track ecological changes and trends.

agents.name: marine_habitat_assessment_agent
agents.role: Assesses the status of marine habitats and checks for biodiversity-rich areas.

agents.name: species_interaction_analysis_agent
agents.role: Analyzes interactions between species to understand ecosystem dependencies.

agents.name: ecosystem_trend_forecasting_agent
agents.role: Projects future ecosystem trends based on current data and species interactions.

agents.name: sustainable_fishing_management_agent
agents.role: Manages sustainable fishing practices to balance ecological health and economic needs.

agents.name: fishing_activity_prediction_agent
agents.role: Predicts future fishing activities and trends based on historical data.

agents.name: fishing_quota_optimization_agent
agents.role: Optimizes fishing quotas to ensure long-term sustainability.

agents.name: catch_sustainability_evaluation_agent
agents.role: Evaluates the sustainability of current catch levels against ecological benchmarks.

agents.name: environmental_impact_forecaster_agent
agents.role: Forecasts environmental impacts of marine activities to pre-emptively mitigate issues.

agents.name: pollution_analysis_agent
agents.role: Analyzes levels of marine pollution and their sources.

agents.name: climate_change_effect_agent
agents.role: Assesses climate change effects on marine ecosystems and forecasts future scenarios.

agents.name: impact_mitigation_suggestions_agent
agents.role: Suggests strategies to mitigate identified environmental impacts.

agents.name: population_dynamics_agent
agents.role: Monitors and models species population dynamics to support conservation efforts.

agents.name: species_population_modeling_agent
agents.role: Models population dynamics using current data to identify risk and recovery areas.

agents.name: genetic_diversity_analysis_agent
agents.role: Analyzes genetic diversity to inform species survival strategies.

agents.name: species_recovery_plan_agent
agents.role: Develops recovery plans for endangered species based on population dynamics and genetic data.

agents.name: illegal_fishing_prevention_agent
agents.role: Prevents illegal fishing activities by monitoring and enforcing regulations.

agents.name: real_time_surveillance_agent
agents.role: Provides real-time monitoring of fishing zones to detect illegal activities.

agents.name: enforcement_strategy_agent
agents.role: Develops enforcement strategies based on surveillance data to deter illegal fishing.

agents.name: community_benefits_agent
agents.role: Ensures socio-economic benefits for communities dependent on marine resources.

agents.name: economic_impact_analysis_agent
agents.role: Analyzes the economic impacts of marine management strategies on local communities.

agents.name: livelihood_enhancement_planner_agent
agents.role: Plans strategies to enhance community livelihoods in harmony with marine conservation.

tools.name: oceanographic_data_integration_tool
tools.description: Integrates diverse oceanographic datasets for comprehensive analysis.

data_sources.description: List of sources from which oceanographic data is compiled.

analysis_types.description: Types of analysis to be conducted with the integrated data.

tools.name: stakeholder_engagement_tool
tools.description: Facilitates communication and engagement with community stakeholders.

feedback_required.description: Whether feedback from stakeholders is needed.
